Text:
Use MKVTOOLNIX to mux audio and video without having to think about delays or whatever... and you got a nice mkv container file!

Good Luck!
@qms, I did what you said, but it didn't work. it was totally desynchronised. i'm not really sure how to synchronise this thing. is there any easy way?
OK, @nate_drake, I did what you said on the description and it's actually pretty good. It's not perfect, but... Thanks!
